import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Issues } from '../issue'; import { IssueService } from '../service/issue.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-issues', templateUrl: './issues.component.html', styleUrls: ['./issues.component.scss'] }) export class IssuesComponent implements OnInit{ //a:string=""; title='Demonstration of passing data between components, styles demo'; appName='issue list - online Shopping App'; issue: Issues={desc:'',severity:'',status:''}; // issues: Issues[] = [{ // desc: 'On clicking delete,the application crashes', // severity: 'Critical', // status: 'Open' // },{ // desc: 'The heading add is wrongly displayed as Edit', // severity: 'Minor', // status: 'Closed' // },{ // desc: 'The Payment Functionality is missing', // severity: 'Major', // status: 'In Progress' // }]; issues: Issues[] =[]; recentlyAddedIssue=''; severities:string[]=['Critical','Minor','Major']; constructor( private issueService: IssueService){ } ngOnInit(): void { console.log('component is inited'); this.getInitialIssues(); } addIssue(issue:any) { this.recentlyAddedIssue='Recently added issue: '+issue.desc+','+issue.severity+','+issue.status; // this.issues.push(issue); this.issueService.addIssues(issue) .subscribe(data => { console.log(data) this.getInitialIssues(); }) } getInitialIssues(){ this.issueService .getIssues() .subscribe((res: Issues[]) => { this.issues = res }) } }
